summary:
I, Marleen Brouwer (1986), am a graduate in political science, conflict resolution and international development. Full of energy I commit myself to the challenges of our society. Cooperation, communication and creativity are central to my work. My professional experience comes from working with NGOs in the Netherlands and abroad, research institutes, the Dutch national government and the European Commission.

profile_positions.title: Business development / Project management Business & Human Rights

profile_positions.description:
This position is part of the YEP programme. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Netherlands Water Partnership have initiated the Young Expert Programme Water (YEP Water) and the Young Expert Programme Agrofood (YEP Agrofood) - in partnership with the Food & Business Knowledge Platform - with the objective of providing assurances for the continued availability of international professionalism and expertise in the water and agri & business sector. Both programmes are carried out in YEP Programmes (www.yepprogrammes.com).
 
YEP Programmes offers Dutch young professionals an opportunity to acquire professional experience abroad and young local professionals an opportunity to take their first steps in an international work environment via Dutch organisations. In adopting this approach YEP Programmes makes a contribution to a dynamic international water and agri & business network and makes this network open to a new generation of young experts.
